thread.title: One Direction singer Niall Horan has ditched his teenage blond locks once and for all
thread.title_full: One Direction singer Niall Horan has ditched his teenage blond locks once and for all

author: Lucy Buckland
title: One Direction singer Niall Horan has ditched his teenage blond locks once and for all
text:
One Direction singer Niall Horan has ditched his teenage blond locks once and for all The 1D singer turned heads with his latest look taking him from bottle blond to natural brunette Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
One Direction star Nial Horan is known to fans all over the world. 
But you'd be forgiven for doing a double take given the boyband star's latest look. 
The singer stepped out with his recognisably bleach blond locks transformed to a deep shade of brown. 
Niall was pictured at Sir Lucian Grainge's 2017 Artist Showcase in LA proudly showcasing his more natural 'do. 
Dressed casually in a button-down denim shirt, jeans and grey slip on trainers, Niall smiled as he happily posed for pictures ahead of the pre- Grammy event. Read More Cheryl's pregnancy CONFIRMED by Niall Horan as he teases Liam Payne is 'nervous' to become a dad Former bottle-blond Niall Horan debuts new 'do as he attends Sir Lucian Grainge's 2017 Artist Showcase in LA (Photo: WireImage) The Irish boyband star looked completely different as he posed with a signed guitar sporting his new look hair (Photo: WireImage) 
With his laid-back attire, and noticeable stubble the Irish singer could be attempting a more grown-up look as he moves on from the clean-cut boyband image he became known for alongside his One Direction bandmates. 
After seemingly deciding that blonds do not have more fun, Niall has been steadily easing off the bleach over the last few weeks. 
The transformation hasn't gone unnoticed with observant fans who took to social media to comment on the hunk's new look. The former X-Factor star is more known for his gelled bleach blonde locks X Factor's One Direction left to right: Niall Horan, Louis Tomlinson, Harry Styles, Liam Payne and Zayn Malik arrive for an autograph signing session at the HMV store, Bradford. Anna Gowthorpe/PA Wire. 2011 (Photo: PA) 
And it's fair to say the reaction has been mixed. 
"The fact that Niall Horan doesn't have blonde hair anymore is actually devastating" commented one fan. While another added: "The fact that Niall Horan hasn't bleached his hair is giving me life never do it again Niall I love your brown hair." 
The former bottle-blonde singer later took to the stage at the Universal Music Groups party and performed hit single 'This Town'. 
Singer Katy Perry was also in attendance at the pre-Gammy bash, ahead of her much anticipated performance at the main even tonight. Like us on Facebook
